channel.title: author_name|Jon Fingas on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in author_name|Jon Fingas on TechnoStreet

item.title: FCC proposes rules to prevent fake emergency alerts
item.description: FCC proposes rules to prevent fake emergency alerts The Federal Communications Commission is well aware of the potential damage from fake emergency alerts, and it's hoping to minimize the threat with policy changes.

item.title: The New York Post is the latest news outlet to get hacked
item.description: The New York Post is the latest news outlet to get hacked Fast Company isn't the only news outlet to suffer a recent, high-profile security breach.

item.title: Lyft's re-launched Pink subscription starts at $10 per month
item.description: Lyft’s re-launched Pink subscription starts at $10 per month Lyft is once again rethinking its monthly subscription plan, and this time the cost might be easier to justify.

item.title: A store that sells Nothing will open in London this year
item.description: A store that sells Nothing will open in London this year Nothing only just released its first phone months ago, but that isn't stopping the company from establishing a physical retail presence.
